isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, DT-466E, I-530E AND T-444E - OPERATION - Air Temperature Sensor (ATS)

svcproc.title: Air Temperature Sensor (ATS)
svcproc.para: The ECM (379) sends a regulated 5 volt reference signal through circuit 97AX to the Air Temperature Sensor (463). As the temperature changes, the sensor changes resistance and provides the ECM with an air temperature signal voltage. The sensor is grounded through circuit 97BU/97WB to the ECM signal ground.
